mean_cn: adj.亲密的，密切的；详细的；  vt.宣布，通知；  n.密友，知己
mean_en: (of people) having a close and friendly relationship; private and personal, often in a sexual way
sentence: Nothing is sweeter than being with intimate lovers.
sentence_trans: 没什么比和亲密的恋人在一起更幸福了。
word_etyma: intim内心的 + ate……的 → 内心的 → 亲近的；不说出口的 → intimate亲密的
